As a Product Company, making technology quick, seamless and reliable is at the core of what makes us successful. Using a leadership and an SRE mindset, this role is key to hitting our desired uptime goal and ensuring changes to our platform are delivered in a timely manner. This position will also offer the chance to work in a fast-paced, hyper growth environment where innovative ideas are encouraged and collaboration is a must.
